prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a prehistoric creature with a sleek body and vibrant colors.
I want a bug-type Pokemon with unique appendages and a shell-like exterior that stands out in the wild.
Generate an insectoid Pokemon design featuring multiple eyes and a streamlined shape, inspired by ancient fossils.
Make a Pokemon that blends elements of rock and bug types, showcasing a mix of colors and a striking appearance.
Imagine a creature with a blend of aquatic and terrestrial traits, perfect for both forest and cave habitats.
Design a Pokemon that has both shell and limb features, with a color palette that emphasizes greens and reds.
Give me a Pokemon that looks like a prehistoric bug, with unique colors and a fascinating evolutionary backstory.

distinctive_features: Red accents on a primarily black body
